title.en: Omae Imouto ja Nakute Iinazuke datta no kayo!?

altTitles.ja: お前妹じゃなくて許嫁だったのかよ!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Omae Imouto Janakute Iinazuke Datta no ka yo!?

altTitles.en: You Weren't My Sister, but My Fiancée?!

altTitles.ru: Ты была не моей сестрой, а моей невестой!?

altTitles.zh: 你原来不是我的妹妹而是我的未婚妻啊!?

altTitles.vi: Em Gái Tôi Là Hôn Thê Của Tôi!?

description.en:
"Humanity, adore thy little sister—." "I wonder when my sister Kana started becoming distant from me—."

Shina Takashi lamented his current days, where being ignored was not uncommon. One day, his parents dropped a shocking revelation. Not only was Takashi not their biological son... but he was also the fiancé of Kana, whom he thought was his sister! From siblings to potential romantic interests, it’s not easy to sort out feelings. The fluctuating emotions, the bewildering distance. Their relationship undergoes an inevitable change—! She's a sister but not a sister!
description.ja: いつ頃からだろう、妹の佳奈が自分に冷たくなったのは――。無視されることさえ少なくない現在の日々を、椎名隆は嘆いていた。そんなある日、両親から衝撃的な話を切り出される。なんと隆は実の息子ではなかった……だけではなく、妹だと思っていた佳奈の許嫁だった！兄妹から気になる異性へ、なんて簡単には気持ちの整理がつくはずもなく。揺れ動く感情、戸惑う距離感。二人の関係は否応なく変化して――!? 妹だけど妹じゃない！

title.en: Sentai Red Isekai de Boukensha ni Naru

altTitles.ja: 戦隊レッド 異世界で冒険者になる

altTitles.en: The Red Ranger Becomes an Adventurer in Another World

description.en: In the final battle against the evil Exterminators, Asagaki Tougo, a power ranger, traded his life for the enemy's. It seemed like everything was over, but suddenly he found himself in another world! He becomes an adventurer, transforming into Kizuna Red, and continues fighting to save people in trouble! Here he meets a young Wizard named Idola and his journey in this new world begins!
description.ja: 悪の組織との最終決戦で、敵と相打ちになった戦隊ヒーローの浅垣灯悟。命を落としたかに思われたが、気が付くと異世界に転生していたのだった！　異世界でも困った人々を救うため冒険者となり、キズナレッドに変身して今日も戦い続ける――！

altTitles.en: Fabulous Beasts
There Are Beasts

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

title.en: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attacks

altTitles.zh: 我的假女友正全力防御她们的进攻

altTitles.en: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attack
My Fake Girlfriends are using me as a Shield

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Jia Nüyou Zheng Quanli Fangyu Tamen De Jingong

altTitles.de: Meine falschen Freundinnen benutzen mich als Schutzschild

description.en: One day, I was suddenly confessed to by a girl, and in order to reject her, I had to find a fake girlfriend! I didn’t expect that my plan to avoid trouble… would lead to even bigger trouble?! The tsundere "Vicious Princess" from the Archery Club, the "White Fox" who is adept at teasing, the "Flower of the Highlands" with straight black hair, and…a sister with a severe case of brocon! Could my youth romantic comedy be wrong as well too?!

altTitles.en: Pocket Monsters RéBURST

altTitles.ja: ポケットモンスター リバースト
ポケットモンスターRéBURST

description.en: The story begins with the protagonist leaving his town where people and Pokémon live in peace together in order to locate his father. The hero doesn’t know much about his father besides the fact that he is a powerful swordsman. On his journey, the protagonist meets up with new friends and foes and discovers the power of Burst Heart Crystals, these crystals entrap a Pokémon inside and allow humans transform themselves partly into them in order to take advantage of their special abilities and attacks.

altTitles.ja: ボクを知りたすぎる清水さん

altTitles.en: Shimizu-san who wants to know me too much

description.en:
Atago Gato is a shy and reclusive high school boy. One day, while preparing for the school festival, a cute and cheerful classmate named Shimizu Roman finds out that he is aiming to become a manga artist. Isn't that amazing? The popular girl, who seems to live in a different world from him, takes an interest in him and asks him a lot of questions he never expected! When he confesses a traumatic experience after being criticized on SNS... Shimizu-san tries to help him overcome it in a slightly strange way...? A youthful romantic comedy in which a cheerful girl and a gloomy boy struggle to make manga!

(Source: AniList)
description.es: Atago Gato es un chico de instituto tímido y solitario. Un día, mientras se prepara para el festival escolar, una simpática y alegre compañera de clase llamada Shimizu Roman descubre que aspira a convertirse en dibujante de manga. ¿No es increíble? La chica popular, que parece vivir en un mundo distinto al suyo, se interesa por él y le hace un montón de preguntas que no esperaba. Cuando confiesa una experiencia traumática tras ser criticado en SNS... Shimizu-san intenta ayudarle a superarlo de una forma un tanto extraña...? ¡Una comedia romántica juvenil en la que una chica alegre y un chico sombrío luchan por hacer manga!
description.id:
Atago Gato adalah anak SMA yang pemalu dan tertutup. Suatu hari, saat mempersiapkan festival sekolah, teman sekelasnya yang lucu dan ceria bernama Shimizu Roman mengetahui bahwa dia bercita-cita menjadi seorang seniman manga. Bukankah itu luar biasa? Gadis populer, yang sepertinya hidup di dunia yang berbeda darinya, menaruh minat padanya dan menanyakan banyak pertanyaan yang tidak pernah dia duga! Saat dia mengakui pengalaman traumatis setelah dikritik di SNS... Shimizu-san mencoba membantunya mengatasinya dengan cara yang sedikit aneh...?
Sebuah komedi romantis masa muda di mana seorang gadis ceria dan seorang anak laki-laki muram berjuang untuk membuat manga!
description.ja: 陰キャで引っ込み思案の高校生・愛宕画人（あたごがくと）。ある日、文化祭の準備中に陽キャで可愛すぎる女子高生・清水ろまんに『マンガ家を目指している』ことがバレてしまう。「めっちゃスゴくない！？」住む世界が違うカノジョから興味を持たれて、まさかの質問攻め！？ SNSで批判されたトラウマを告白すると…清水さんは、ちょっぴりカゲキな方法で克服させようとしてきて――？　陽キャな女子と陰キャな男子がマンガ作りに奮闘する青春ラブコメ！
description.es-la: Atago Gato es un chico de instituto tímido y solitario. Un día, mientras se prepara para el festival escolar, una simpática y alegre compañera de clase llamada Shimizu Roman descubre que aspira a convertirse en dibujante de manga. ¿No es increíble? La chica popular, que parece vivir en un mundo distinto al suyo, se interesa por él y le hace un montón de preguntas que no esperaba. Cuando confiesa una experiencia traumática tras ser criticado en SNS... Shimizu-san intenta ayudarle a superarlo de una forma un tanto extraña...? ¡Una comedia romántica juvenil en la que una chica alegre y un chico sombrío luchan por hacer manga!

description.en: Dani and Dorian have missed the bus of the school of magic. Now, they must find someone who teach them how to be a great and good witches… Or maybe not.​
description.es: Dani y Dorian han perdido el bus a la Escuela de Magia. Ahora, ellos deben encontrar a alguien que les enseñe como ser geniales y buenos hechiceros… o tal vez no.
description.ru: Однажды двое юных волшебников опоздали на Хогвартс-экс… на свой автобус в школу волшебства. Домой вернуться — прибьют, учиться самим — «гори-гори ясно, злостное колдунство» в исполнении местных совершенно немагических жителей. Не учиться совсем — быть Дэни оружием массового поражения, а ее брату Дориану остаться без прав на вождение метлой. Придется искать учителя, чтобы помог набраться ума-разума… или нет. Такого эпично сказочного прогула вы еще не видели!

altTitles.en: Bungo Stray Dogs: STORM BRINGER

altTitles.ru: Великий из Бродячих Псов: Приносящий Шторм

altTitles.ja: 文豪ストレイドッグス STORM BRINGER

altTitles.vi: Văn Hào Lưu Lạc: STORM BRINGER

altTitles.ja: 文豪ストレイドッグス ＳＴＯＲＭ ＢＲＩＮＧＥＲ

description.en: It's been roughly one year since Chūya Nakahara joined the Port Mafia, and he's got his sights set on an executive position. But as he makes plans to move up, a man by the name of Paul Verlaine—claiming to be his older brother—appears and vows to assassinate everyone he cares about! Now, Chūya must team up with Adam, a European A.I. investigator, to stop this lunatic before the storm swallows Yokohama once again…

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people?
___
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!! アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

altTitles.en: While You’re In Love

description.en:
"I didn’t marry my wife because I loved her. I just signed a contract with her at her request."
I actually knew the truth, so it’s not his fault. I was the one who developed false expectations. I had spent three years as his wife. and I tried hard to be the right woman for him, but I couldn’t get a piece of his heart.
"I didn’t know it would last this long. It’s annoying."
I was nothing to him to the extent that he all but forgot about me as soon as the heroine appeared. In the end, she was always going to be the main character and I was always going to be an extra. No matter how hard I try, my role isn't changing. So it’s only right for me to leave.
"I’m sorry I’ve been bothering you all this time. Please be happy with her."
description.ko: 아슬란의 아내로 지냈던 3년. 그에게 어울리는 여자가 되려고 무던히 노력했으나, 그의 마음을 얻을 수 없었다. 소설 속 여자 주인공이 나타나자마자 버려질 정도로, 나는 그에게 아무것도 아닌 존재였다. 주인공은 주인공, 엑스트라는 엑스트라. 아무리 애를 써도 나는 고작해야 귀찮은 엑스트라에 불과할 뿐. 그러니까 내가 떠나는 게 맞는 것이다.
description.tr: Siz Aşıkken ben aslında gerçeği biliyordum. “Karımla onu sevdiğim için evlenmedim.” Yani bu onun hatası değildi. Yanlış beklentilere sahip olmak benim hatamdı. “Onunla sadece ihtiyaçlara dayalı bir sözleşme imzaladım.” Karısı olarak üç yıl. Onun için doğru kadın olmak için çok uğraştım ama kalbinden bir parça alamadım. “Bu kadar uzun süreceğini bilmiyordum. Sinir bozucu.” Kadın kahraman ortaya çıkar çıkmaz bir kenara atıldığım ölçüde onun için bir hiçtim. Sonunda, ana karakter ana karakterdi ve figüran da figürandı. Ne kadar uğraşırsam uğraşayım, ben sadece sinir bozucu bir figürandım. Rolüm değişmedi. Bu yüzden ayrılmak benim için doğru. “Bunca zaman seni rahatsız ettiğim için özür dilerim. Lütfen onunla mutlu ol.”

description.en: A prince has been cursed to turn into a frog by a witch. Things went wild from there.
description.vi: Một hoàng tử bị biến thành con ếch bởi một mụ phù thủy. Chuyện diễn ra tiếp theo khá là kì cục.
description.pt-br: Um príncipe foi amaldiçoado por uma bruxa e transformado em um sapo. A partir daí, as coisas saíram completamente de controle.

altTitles.ja: 東京エイリアンズ

description.en: Gunji Akira, who has just started high school, has been chasing after his father's ghost by trying to become a police officer just like him. One day however, he has a surprise encounter with an alien while leaving school. And there begins the start of his fateful adventures with extraterrestrial life…
description.vi: Một ngày đẹp trời, Gunji Akira, một học sinh trung học bình thường đã đặt chân lên toa tàu định mệnh; và từ đó, cuộc đời cậu đã thay đổi hoàn toàn. Câu chuyện gay lọ à nhầm gay cấn đã bắt đầu~

altTitles.en: Kurosagi Corpse Delivery Service

altTitles.ja: 黒鷺死体宅配便

description.en:
Your body is their business!  
Five young students at a Buddhist university, three guys and two girls, find little call for their job skills in today's Tokyo…among the living, that is! 
But all that stuff in college they were told would never pay off — you know, channeling, dowsing, ESP — gives them a direct line to the dead…
the dead who are still trapped in their corpses and can't move on to the next reincarnation.  
  
The five form the *Kurosagi* ("Black Heron”, their ominous bird logo) *Corpse Delivery Service*: whether suicide, murder, accident, or illness, 
they'll carry your body wherever it needs to go to free your soul! 
The kids from Kurosagi can smell a customer a mile away — it's a good thing one of the girls majored in embalming!

title.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.pt-br: Shangri-La Frontier - o caçador de jogos ruins experimenta um jogo Divino.

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.ja: “クソゲー”をこよなく愛する男・陽務楽郎。彼が次に挑んだのは、総プレイヤー数3000万人の“神ゲー”『シャングリラ・フロンティア』だった!　集う仲間、広がる世界。そして“宿敵”との出会いが、彼の、全てのプレイヤーの運命を変えていく!!
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".
description.pt-br:
O estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, Rakuro Hizutome, adora encontrar os chamados “jogos ruins” e dar uma surra neles. Quando ele decide mudar as coisas jogando um novo jogo de realidade virtual de “nível divino” conhecido como Shangri-La Frontier (também conhecido como SLF), ele faz o que faz de melhor: min-maxes, pula o prólogo e pula direto para Ação! Rakuro pode ser um jogador experiente, mas um encontro com um antigo rival mudará para sempre o destino de cada jogador SLF.

Vestido apenas com shorts e uma máscara de pássaro, Rakuro (nome do jogador: Sunraku) se lança no mundo do SLF. As coisas vão bem no início, quando ele derruba um duende, um coelho e até uma píton. Mas então Sunraku se depara com um lobo enorme e contundente conhecido como Lycagon, o Matador da Noite. Os anos de experiência em “jogos ruins” de Sunraku serão suficientes ou ele está prestes a sofrer um rude despertar apenas algumas horas em sua aventura SLF?

title.en: Tsuihousareta Renkinjutsushi wa Mujikaku ni Densetsu to Naru Yandere Imouto (Oukoku no Shugoryuu) to Issho ni Henkyou de Shiawase ni Kurashimasu!

altTitles.ja: 追放された錬金術師は無自覚に伝説となる ヤンデレ妹（王国の守護竜）と一緒に辺境で幸せに暮らします！

altTitles.en: The Exiled Alchemist Unwittingly Becomes a Legend Living Happily on the Frontier with his Yandere Sister (The Guardian Dragon of the Kingdom)!

description.en:
One day, Mys, the eldest son of Duke Windsor, is sentenced by the king to be exiled to the border. The king claims that his secret visit to Valitra, the strongest dragon that protects the kingdom, is an attempt at treason against the kingdom. However, Valitra's guardian dragon is actually Mys' younger sister, Tinny, who was thought to have died four years ago! 

"Mys Nii-sama is the one who saved my life, the one who is worthy to rule everything in the world [Supreme Being]. Anyone who hurts Mys Nii-sama will be thrown into hell!" 

And the Kingdom is heading towards destruction, having incurred the wrath of its guardian dragon, Valitra... Meanwhile, on the border where Mys has become the ruler, his alchemy techniques are leading to unprecedented developments and making everyone happy - and once again, the kingdom is in danger of destruction.
description.id: Suatu hari, Mys, putra tertua dari Duke Windsor, dijatuhi hukuman oleh raja untuk diasingkan ke perbatasan. Raja mengklaim bahwa kunjungan rahasianya ke Valitra, naga terkuat yang melindungi kerajaan, merupakan usaha pengkhianatan terhadap kerajaan. Namun, naga penjaga Valitra sebenarnya adalah adiknya Meis, Tinny, yang dikira telah meninggal empat tahun lalu! “Mys Nii-sama adalah orang yang menyelamatkan hidupku, orang yang layak untuk memerintah segala sesuatu di dunia [Makhluk Tertinggi]. Siapapun yang menyakiti Mys Nii-sama akan ku lemparkan ke dalam neraka!” Dan Kerajaan sedang menuju kehancuran, setelah menimbulkan kemarahan naga pelindungnya, Valitra… Sementara itu, di perbatasan di mana Mys telah menjadi penguasa, teknik alkemisnya mengarah pada perkembangan yang belum pernah terjadi sebelumnya dan membuat semua orang bahagia – dan sekali lagi, kerajaan berada dalam bahaya kehancuran.
description.ja: まともな回復薬すら作れないことから、家族から無能扱いされていたウィンザー公爵家の長男・マイス。彼はある日、国王から辺境ベオグラードへの追放を言い渡されてしまう。王国を守るドラゴン【守護竜ヴァリトラ】のもとへ通っていたことが、王国への反逆に当たるというのだ。しかし実は、守護竜ヴァリトラの正体は4年前に死んだと思われていたマイスの妹ティニーであった――。「マイス兄様こそ私の命の恩人にして、この世のすべてを統べるに相応しい【至高にして至大であられるお方】です。マイス兄様を傷つける者は、この私が地獄に叩き落します！」

altTitles.zh-ro: Pian Zhi Zong Cai Qiu Fang Guo

description.en:
Gu Xiaoran has always had a crush on the gentle and well-mannered Mo Ziyan. But years ago, he disappeared without a trace. Fast forward to the present, in a bid to save her father, Gu Xiaoran has no choice but to marry Han Ke. However, to everyone's surprise, on the night of their engagement banquet, the long-lost Mo Ziyan makes a dramatic reappearance, disrupting the engagement. However, he is no longer the man she once knew—he is now Mo Qing, the ruthless mastermind behind the persecution of her father and the leader of the Imperial Group! 
What seems like a cruel tale of an abusive male lead tormenting his wife hides a deeper truth. Who is silently resolving her troubles behind the scenes? And who truly holds the upper hand in this tangled game of love and power?

altTitles.en: Mystic Messenger

description.en:
…Can you see these messages?   
  
While trying to find the owner of a lost phone, an ambiguous "Unknown" starts texting you! As soon as you enter the studio he mentioned, you see a bunch of hotties?!  
  
We invite you to <Mystic Messenger>!  
  
Based on the otome game developed by Cheritz Co., Ltd

description.en:
10 years after the ending of the original, comes the sequel to the manga series *Muhyo to Rouji no Mahouritsu Soudan Jimusho*.  
  
*Muhyo to Roji no Mahouritsu Soudan Jimusho: Mazoku Magushi-hen*, follows Muhyo, Rouji and all their friends some time after the conclusion of the main series.  
  
---

Magical Law (Mahouritsu)... its purpose is to punish spirits who have harmed human beings or have committed wrongdoings.

Muhyo, who is a genius practitioner of Magic Law and the youngest Executor ever, and Jirou Kusano (Roji), Muhyo's crybaby assistant who hardly ever supports him, investigate mysterious blackouts and spiritual phenomena that have been occurring in the city frequently. Moreover, those blackouts involve a person called the "demon magician," who creates forbidden tools.

As they investigate further an ominous shadow approaches the two...!?

After solving numerous cases and mysteries in the past, will Muhyo and Roji succeed again?

title.en: Kaifuku Jutsushi no Yarinaoshi ~Sokushi Mahou to Skill Copy no Chouetsu Heal~

altTitles.ja: 回復術士のやり直し～即死魔法とスキルコピーの超越ヒール～

altTitles.en: Redo of Healer

altTitles.es-la: El Reinicio Como Sanador ~La Magia de Muerte Instantánea Con La Habilidad de Copiar La Curación Trascendental~

description.de: Keyaru wurde durch sein Unwissen immer und immer wieder ausgenutzt. Aber eines Tages erkannte er die wahre Macht der Heilmagie und kam zu der Überzeugung, dass ein Heiler die stärkste Klasse sei. Wie auch immer, ehe ihm das Potential eines Heilers klar wurde, war er bereits allem beraubt worden. Daher wandte er seine Heilmagie auf die Welt selbst an und reiste so 4 Jahre in der Zeit zurück. Er würde sich für alles rächen, was man ihm angetan hatte. Dies ist die kranke heldenhafte Geschichte eines Heilers, der der stärkste wurde, indem er sein Wissen über Heilung und seine Erfahrungen aus seinem vorherigen Leben kombiniert.
description.en:
"Healing magicians cannot fight alone."

Keyaru, who was bound by this common knowledge, was exploited again and again by others. But one day, he noticed what lay beyond healing magic, and was convinced that a healing magician was the strongest class. However, by the time he realized that potential, he was deprived of everything. Thus, he used healing magic on the world itself to go back four years, deciding to redo everything.
description.it:
"I maghi curatori non possono combattere da soli." Keyaru, che era legato a questa conoscenza comune, fu sfruttato più e più volte dagli altri.  
Ma un giorno notò cosa c'era oltre la guarigione della magia e si convinse che il mago guaritore fosse la classe più forte. Tuttavia, quando ne realizzò il potenziale, fu privato di tutto. Così, usando la magia curativa sul mondo stesso, è tornato indietro di quattro anni, determinato a ricominciare tutto da capo.
description.ja: 【癒】の勇者ケヤルは、ある日【回復(ヒール)】が最強に至る魔法だと確信する。そして世界そのものを【回復】して四年前に戻り、自分の人生を弄んだ者たちへ復讐することを誓うのだった。
description.pl:
"Uzdrowiciele nie mogą walczyć w pojedynkę."  
Keare, który wiedział o tym aż za dobrze, był raz po raz wykorzystywany przez innych.  
Ale pewnego dnia odkrywa coś, co kryje się poza magią uzdrowienia, i zyskuje pewność, że uzdrowiciel to najpotężniejsza z klas maga. Jednakże zanim zdał sobie sprawę z jej potencjału, został już pozbawiony wszystkiego, co miał. Dlatego właśnie użył magii uzdrowienia na samym świecie, by cofnąć się w czasie o cztery lata, postanawiając, że zacznie wszystko od nowa.  
Oto heroiczna opowieść o pewnym uzdrowicielu, który stał się najsilniejszym dzięki wykorzystaniu wiedzy z dawnego życia i magii uzdrawiania.
description.pt-br:
"Magos de cura não podem lutar sozinhos." 

Keare, que estava vinculado por esse conhecimento comum, foi explorado uma vez ou outra pelos outros. Mas um dia, ele notou o que estava além da magia de cura e estava convencido de que um mago de cura era a classe mais forte. No entanto, quando percebeu esse potencial, ele estava privado de tudo. Assim, ele usou a magia de cura no próprio mundo para voltar quatro anos, decidindo refazer tudo. Este é um conto heroico de um mago de cura que se tornou o mais forte usando o conhecimento de sua vida passada e magia de cura.

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---

description.en:
The Noble Lady binds Tentacle Maid

Sharan, a pious girl, has secured a well-paying job as a maid. Her mission is to serve a prideful, sadistic noble lady named Lynette. However, her job won't simply be that easy....

altTitles.en: Lonely Monster and Blind Girl

altTitles.vi: Yêu Quái Cô Đơn Và Cô Bé Bị Mù

altTitles.ja: ぼっち怪物と盲目少女

altTitles.pt-br: O Monstro Solitário e a Garota Cega

description.en:
A lonely monster, living in seclusion in the forest, wishes she could live amidst humans despite her frightening appearance. 
Everything changes when she starts getting a visitor–a blind human girl who’s fascinated with her mysterious forest friend. 
As the monster and the girl grow attached in their secluded world, their love proves that beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
description.pt-br:
Nas profundezas de uma floresta, uma garota-fera vive seus dias solitária, até que um dia ela encontra uma invasora, 
uma jovem moça cega que acaba adentrando a floresta atraída pelas flores. 
Pela primeira vez um humano não sentiu medo e demonstrou ser gentil com ela.
Encantada pela situação, a fera mente e começa a se encontrar com a jovem, contando-lhe histórias e aventuras. 
E aos poucos, essa conexão especial começa a aquecer o coração dessa fera solitária.

description.en: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

altTitles.zh-ro: Lian'ai Rang Wo Youle Chao Nengli

altTitles.en: Falling In Love Gives Me Superpowers

description.en: Art student Zhong Shenxiu encountered a problem during a sketching class. She couldn't "truly see" Xu Ke, a top student and the subject of the sketch. If she can't truly see the subject then she can't draw. Zhong Shenxiu put down her paintbrush. If she became a better student, she would be able to get closer to her, right? If she could get closer to her, then she could truly see her, right? Until the distance between them is no more--Face to face. Phew! Now I can finally see her! But! This is... Too close! Help! What Should I do?!!!

description.en: Love is absolutely forbidden! Kaworu, the "public disciplinary commissioner of justice," uses a chainsaw to purge all the men of their sins in order to protect the purity of the girls! Standing in Kaworu's way is the "boy with high femininity," Takahisa, and Kaworu's sister, Mari, the "demon public disciplinary commissioner." In this parallel world of "Freak Island" set in Santa Maria Academy, a storm of blood and love is about to... erupt!!?

description.en:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me “Master”!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/57098)
description.fr:
Fujiwara est un mangaka amateur, il dessine des mangas érotiques alors qu’il n’est que collégien. Tandis qu'il lisait un porno à l'école, une jolie fille nommée Sasha qui s’avère être très intéressée par ces choses, et lui adresse la parole, elle se met même à l’appeler "Maître" !? 

  C’est l'histoire d'une belle et joyeuse fille qui se porte volontaire pour être mon disciple dans la perversion.
description.ja: 僕は未来の大漫画家にして現えっちな同人誌アシの中学生。学校で同人誌を読んでいたら、えっち方面に興味津々の美少女、サーシャさんから「ししょー」と呼ばれ‥‥!?
description.es-la: Sin importarle el qué dirán y sin temor a caer en lo más bajo de la escala social dentro de la escuela, Otaku-kun no oculta su gran afición por los mangas para adultos, cosa que le hace ganarse el rechazo de su salón apenas en el primer día de clases; sin embargo, Sasha, lejos de sentir aberración por su afición, muestra un interés peculiar, iniciando así una relación... ¡¿mentor-alumna?!

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

altTitles.vi: Giết Chết Nam Chính, Ta Trở Thành Nữ Ma Đầu.

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

altTitles.en: Kubera - One Last God
Kubera: One Last God
One Last God Kubera
One Last God, Kubera

altTitles.ja: クベーラ

description.en:
Gods with everlasting lives. Sura who possess unrivaled power. And humans, caught helplessly in-between.  
When Kubera's peaceful village meets its fiery end, a mysterious magician named Asha comes to her rescue. Together they begin a journey in search of answers and revenge. Meanwhile across the realms, a web of entwined fates is growing tighter. One by one the other players of the game will emerge, each with their own agenda to pursue.  
At the center of this maelstrom stands Kubera, the girl with a god's name. Will this sixteen-year-old be the salvation of the world or its destruction?
description.it:
Dei immortali. Sura dai poteri impareggiabili. E gli umani, che si ergono fra loro impotenti.  
Quando il pacifico villaggio di Kubera incontra la sua fine, una misteriosa maga di nome Asha accorre in suo soccorso. Insieme intraprendono un viaggio in cerca di risposte e vendetta. Mentre attraversano il regno, una rete di destini intersecati sta nascendo… Una ad una le altre pedine della scacchiera emergono, ognuna all'inseguimento dei propri obiettivi.  
Al centro di quest'uragano si trova Kubera, la ragazza con il nome di un Dio. Questa sedicenne sarà la salvatrice di questo mondo… o la sua distruttrice?
description.pl:
Bogowie z nieśmiertelnymi żywotami  
Asury z niepojętą mocą  
I ludzie, pomiędzy nimi.  
Gdy wioska Kubery zostaje zniszczona, tajemniczy mag przychodzi jej na ratunek. Razem wyruszają w podróż w poszukiwaniu odpowiedzi i zemsty. Tymczasem pomiędzy wymiarami pajęczyna przeznaczenia coraz ciaśniej zaciska się… Jeden po drugim nowi gracze wkraczają na scenę, mając swoje własne powody. Historia młodej dziewczyny, która traci wszystko i zaczyna żyć zemstą.

title.en: Uragirareta Boukensha, Andeddo Toshite Yomigaeri Musou Suru

altTitles.ja: アンデッド・キング 〜底辺冒険者、魔物の力で進化無双〜

altTitles.en: Undead King ~A Low-Ranking Adventurer, With the Power of Monsters, Becomes Unbeatable~

altTitles.ja: 裏切られた冒険者、アンデッドとして蘇り無双する

description.en:
(skills). A power humans can only receive once from god, which is used to fight against monsters.
Chrome, who aspired to be an adventurer while owning a skill that is useless in combat, is unable to throw away his ambition, and is despised for his inability, so he is left in charge of menial tasks and chores for his career.
But, when he is running away from a monster as a decoy, he loses his life. But at that time, his skill activates. The skill (Revival). For one time only, he can come back from the dead, and Chrome miraculously revives as a Skeleton monster, a “Wight”.
Chrome, who despairs at his new body, finds out that as monsters evolve, their appearance changes in accordance, so he decides to evolve as fast as possible. Believing he can regain his human appearance, Chrome spends his days hunting monsters. As a by-product, Chrome gains a multitude of skills, whereas a human can only ever hold one––!
Powerful monster abilities and the intelligence of a human. Overcoming adversity with chance, Chrome once again aims to be the strongest adventurer!

title.en: Magabanashi: Ghost Stories Spreading on Social Media

altTitles.ja: 禍話: SNSで伝播する令和怪談

altTitles.ja-ro: Magabanashi: SNS de Denpa suru Reiwa Kaidan

description.en: Based on the popular horror radio show Magabanashi, this anthology captures supernatural stories that have taken on a life of their own across social media. Readers are cautioned that these tales come with risks, as they tap into deep-seated fears and blur the line between reality and the supernatural.

title.en: The Reborn Young Lord Is an Assassin

altTitles.en: The Regressed Son of a Duke Is an Assassin
The Regressed Youngest Son of the Duke Is an Assassin

altTitles.es: El asesino que retornó como el hijo del Duque
El pibe que retorna como el hijo menor

altTitles.es-la: La venganza del asesino de la espada demoniaca

altTitles.th: ลูกชายคนเล็กของดยุกคือมือสังหาร

altTitles.ja: 回帰した公爵家の末息子は暗殺者

description.en:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

---
Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.

"If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself."

That is how he was given a second chance at life. Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. He will now pave a path on his own, for only him!

title.en: Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka: Familia Chronicle—Episode Freya

altTitles.en: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Familia Chronicle—Episode Freya

description.en:
"Uh…Freya-sama left a letter and has left…"  
  
The members of the Freya Familia all turned at once to look at the messenger. Leaving the shocked first class adventurers aside, the uninhibited Goddess of Beauty leaves on a journey to fulfill her desire!
description.ru:
«Эээ … Фрейя-сама оставила письмо и ушла …»   
  
Члены Семьи Фрейи сразу повернулись, чтобы посмотреть на посланника. Оставив в стороне потрясенных первоклассных авантюристов, раскованная Богиня красоты отправляется в путешествие, чтобы исполнить свое желание!

altTitles.ja: 悪祓士のキヨシくん

altTitles.en: Ultimate Exorcist Kiyoshi

description.en: The most powerful exorcist in history--Kiyoshi! In order to protect that which is precious to him, Kiyoshi has attained ultimate strength. But he has a secret he can't tell anyone... Become a sword that slays evil! Become a shield that protects the weak!
description.ja: 祓清は史上最強の悪祓士（エクソシスト）。弱冠16歳にして初任務にあたっていた。しかし、本当は超ビビり＋ド級の人見知りで…!?　ほんの少しの勇気を胸に、悪魔を祓え!!
description.es-la: El exorcista más poderoso de la historia--¡Kiyoshi! Para poder proteger aquello que considera precioso, Kiyoshi ha obtenido una fuerza sin igual. Pero tiene un secreto que no puede revelar... ¡Conviértete en una espada que corta el mal! ¡Se un escudo que protege a los débiles! ¡Todo eso y más se junta en esta nueva serie de exorcismo, batallas y comedia!
description.pt-br: O exorcista mais poderoso da história: Kiyoshi Harai! Para proteger o que é precioso para ele, Kiyoshi atingiu a força suprema. Mas ele tem um segredo que não pode contar a ninguém... ele virou a espada que erradica o mal! O escudo que protege os fracos! Tudo se junta nessa nova série dramática de comédia e batalha de exorcistas!

altTitles.ja: デリヲの推しごと

description.en: "I wanted to understand my oshi's feelings." ― Sakurako, a shut-in otaku, called a call boy and tried to perform a sexual act for the first time in her life. However, just before the act, Sakurako became afraid, and in her rush, she accidentally revealed an eroge she was in the middle of playing, causing her to panic! Having her fetish revealed to the extroverted and handsome call boy Fuji-kun, she becomes embarrassed, but as she despairs, it's revealed that Fuji-kun was an otaku comrade as well...? This is a pure oshikatsu love story between an otaku girl and a call boy!
description.ja: 「推しの気持ちを知りたかったから」――引きこもりオタクの桜子は、生まれてはじめてデリヘルを呼び、はじめての性行為に及ぼうとしていた。しかし、直前で怖くなってしまった桜子は、慌ててうっかりプレイ途中のエロゲをさらしてしまい、大パニックに。陽キャイケメンデリヘルの藤くんに、自分の性癖をさらしてしまった恥ずかしさに、絶望していたところ、なんと藤くんもオタク仲間で…？ オタク女とデリヘル男、ピュアな推し活ラブストーリー！

altTitles.en: New Prince of Tennis

altTitles.ja: 新テニスの王子様

description.en: The exclusive Japanese U-17 training camp was previously only open to the top high school players in the country. All of this changes when 50 of the nation's best middle school players are selected to join the esteemed training facility—including 12-year-old tennis prodigy Echizen Ryoma. But what seems like an ordinary training camp quickly becomes something far greater than any of the middle schoolers are expecting. The climb to the top of the Japanese tennis world is perilous, but even that journey pales in comparison to the world stage that awaits beyond the summit.

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
No matter how hard things seem to be, there is always 'someone' watching over you.

A ghost who remained in this world with lingering attachments, one day encountered an office worker left exhausted from work, Nozaki.

"Nobody even looks at me..."

Nozaki was consumed with loneliness.
The ghost, who was all alone at the end of his own life, decided to watch over his daily life.

Though left at the mercy of his job, Nozaki desperately carried on each day.
Until one day, he encountered someone new.

The feelings he lost amid the restless day-to-day, through connecting with others, Nozaki will gradually take back.
description.ja:
どんなつらい時でも、見ていてくれる「誰か」がいる。

この世に未練を残してさまよっていた幽霊は、ある日、仕事に疲れた会社員、野崎と出会う。

「俺のことなんて、誰も見てないんだ…」

孤独感に打ちひしがれる野崎。人生の最後に一人ぼっちだった幽霊は、彼の生活を見守ってみることに。仕事に翻弄されながらも必死に日々を送る野崎。やがて彼に新たな出会いが訪れる。忙しない日々の中でこぼれ落ちてしまった気持ちを、野崎は人との関わりの中で、少しずつ取り戻していく――。

description.cs:
Veľká rodina Lombardi bola kedysi na vrchole impéria. Po smrti jej patriarchu sa osud rodiny a Firentie - nemanželskej dcéry, sa rúca do záhuby rukami jej neužitočných a krutých bratrancov. Jej otec zomrel, príbuzní ju vyhodili na ulicu a významná rodina, na ktorú bola taká hrdá, bola úplne zničená... Keď sa však prevtelí do svojho sedemročného ja, bude sa snažiť ochrániť česť rodiny, získať si priazeň starého otca Lulaca a zabrániť smrti vlastného otca. V tomto živote pre ňu existuje len jeden spôsob, ako zvíťaziť: stať sa hlavou ich mocného rodu.

description.en:
I've reincarnated as Firentia Lombardy, the illegitimate daughter of the wealthiest and most influential family in the Empire. I thought I was all set to have a comfortable and luxurious life… but it wasn't long before my beloved father died, my relatives kicked me out, and our family went bankrupt!!

To add insult to injury, I was hit by a carriage one day when I drank (a bit too much) booze to drown my sorrows… but my despair was only temporary. When I opened my eyes, I found that I'd traveled back in time to when I was 7 years old!

I was surprised to see my father again in the flesh. But as if that wasn't already shocking enough, the 2nd prince, our family's once sworn enemy, was now following me around like a dog!

Now that I've been given a second chance at life, I'll take things into my own hands and claim both the 2nd prince and my family for myself!

---
**Links:**
* Alternative Official English - [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/i-shall-master-this-family), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/9247)
description.fr:
Florentia s'est réincarnée comme l'enfant illégitime de la famille la plus riche de l'empire, même si elle n'était pas de sang pure elle pensait que tout irait bien, son père était gentil avec elle, mais à la mort de ce dernier sa famille l'a abandonnée et elle s'est retrouvée seule, puis soudainement le trou noir.

Elle se souvient d'avoir un peu bu puis avoir ressenti un violent coup sur la tête et maintenant elle est de retour dans son corps de 7 ans! L'occasion de tout changer et de devenir même en étant illégitime la cheffe de la famille!

---
La grande famille Lombardi était autrefois au sommet de l’Empire. Après la mort de son patriarche, le sort de la famille et celui de Firentia, née d’un Lombardi et d’un paysan, tombent en ruine aux mains de ses cousins inutiles et cruels. Mais lorsqu’elle se réincarne à l’âge de ses sept ans, elle fera tout pour protéger l’honneur de la famille, gagner les faveurs de son grand-père Lulac et, empêcher la mort de son père. Dans cette vie, il n’y a qu’un seul moyen pour elle de gagner: devenir la cheffe de leur puissante famille.

---

description.id:
Aku pikir aku adalah putri bangsawan yang hidupnya bergelimang harta dan kebahagiaan, tapi ternyata aku ini anak berdarah campuran bangsawan dan rakyat biasa yang keberadaannya tidak dianggap dalam keluargaku sendiri. Ibuku sudah tiada dan tidak ada yang menyayangiku kecuali ayahku sendiri. Setelah bekerja keras mengabdikan diri untuk keluarga ini, siapa sangka aku malah diusir dan berakhir mati tertabrak kereta kuda. Ketika terbangun lagi aku bereinkarnasi untuk kedua kalinya di tubuh yang sama.

description.ja:
今度こそ守れるんじゃないかな？ ランブル帝国随一の家門、ロンバルディを！ 交通事故で死んだ後ロンバルディ家の婚外子として転生したフィレンティア。 だが…彼女を待ち受けていたのは愛する父の死とロンバルディ家の滅亡だった。 家門の滅亡を知った日に彼女は酒を飲んで馬車に轢かれてしまうのだが、目を覚ますと7歳の自分に戻っていた。 今度こそ父と家門を守り抜くと決めたフィレンティア。 彼女を待ち構える試練とは一体何なのか… 当主になると決めた彼女の挑戦が始まるーー！

---

description.ko:
“한번 해 보자, 내가 가주가 되는 거야.”
환생에 회귀까지, 인생 3회차 피렌티아의 가주 되기 프로젝트!

제국 제일가는 명문가 롬바르디가의 막내 손녀 ‘피렌티아’. 그녀는 똑똑하고 능력 있지만 사생아로 태어났다는 이유로 친척들에게 온갖 수모를 당하고, 결국 가문에서 쫓겨나고 만다. 이후 피렌티아는 더 이상 가문 일에 참여할 수 없게 되고, 그저 무능력한 큰아버지의 손에 롬바르디가가 망해가는 것을 지켜볼 수밖에 없었다. 화가 나 술을 진탕 마신 어느 날, 피렌티아는 마차 사고를 당해 죽음을 맞이하는데…. 그러나 어떻게 된 일인지 눈을 떠 보니 거울에 비친 것은 일곱 살 때의 모습?! 전생의 기억을 가지고 회귀한 피렌티아는 다시 찾은 생에서는 롬바르디가의 멸문을 막기 위해 스스로 가주가 되기로 결심하는데…!

---

เมื่อเธอมาเกิดใหม่ในร่างของฟีเรนเทีย ลอมบาร์เดีย บุตรีแห่งตระกูลลอมบาร์เดีย หลังปู่ของเธอเสียไปเธอก็ถูกไล่ออกจากตระกูลและเพียงไม่นานตระกูลได้ล่มสลาย ฟีเรนเทียประสบอุบัติเหตุเสียชีวิตอีกครั้ง และย้อนกลับมาตอนอายุ 7 ขวบ ฟีเรนเทียที่ล่วงรู้อนาคตที่กำลังจะเกิดขึ้นทุกอย่างจึงพยายามแก้ไขทุกอย่างให้ดีขึ้น และมุ่งสู่เส้นทางการขึ้นเป็นผู้นำตระกูล...

description.uk:
"...спробуймо. Я очолю цю родину." Фірентія переродилася позашлюбною дитиною аристократа Ломбарді - наймогутнішої родини в імперії. Ба більше, історія цього роду тотожна історії держави Лембру! Ломбарді, знамениті своїми статками, обросли зв'язками та стали надійними покровителями для талановитих людей. Здавалось, що на Фірентію чекає світле майбутнє... Але її батько помер, а родичі, які прогнали дівчину, розвалили впливовий дім! Трохи (ні) випивши, вона потрапила під екіпаж на шляху додому. "Це занадто..." Фірентія знову розплющила очі семирічною дівчинкою. Тепер вона може врятувати татка і свою родину? А другий принц бігає за нею, немов відданий пес? Гаразд, тоді другий принц і дім Ломбарді належать їй!

---

description.vi:
Gia đình vĩ đại Lombardy, đã một thời đứng đầu đế quốc. Sau cái chết của chủ gia đình, số phận của gia đình và của cả Firentia, sinh ra từ một Lombardy và thường dân, rơi vào tay những anh em họ độc ác và vô dụng của cô ấy. Nhưng khi Firentia quay về cơ thể của mình vào năm 7 tuổi, cô ấy sẽ làm hết sức để bảo vệ danh dự của gia đình, lấy lòng người ông nội Lulac, và ngăn chặn cái chết của cha mình. Trong lần này, chỉ có một đường để Firentia thắng: trở thành mẫu hệ của gia đình vĩ đại này.

意外穿成为了帝国最声名鼎盛的第一家族的私生女。虽然蒂亚头脑出众，也积累了大量的实战经验，但最终在爷爷去世后被叔叔扫地出门，而无能的叔叔很快便败光了家族的产业…… 意外死亡后，又一次重新回了小时候——这一世，蒂亚决定成为家主，重新让家族站上帝国巅峰！

description.pt-br:
Florentia reencarnou como filha ilegítima da família mais rica do império. Ela pensou que tudo iria bem no futuro. Mas seu pai havia falecido, seus parentes a deixaram na porta, e a família honrada de que ela tanto se orgulhava estava completamente arruinada…. Mas isso é real? Ela bebeu um pouco (muito) e foi atropelada por uma carruagem, Quando ela abriu os olhos novamente, ela tinha sete anos? Além disso, o Segundo Príncipe, que era inimigo de sua família em sua vida anterior, está seguindo-a como um cachorro!

title.en: Put It All In The Ring! 2

altTitles.en: Put it all in the Ring 2

altTitles.ja: リングにかけろ2 最終章

description.en: At the end of Ring ni Kakero 1, Ryuuji Takane went up against Superstar Jun Kenzaki for the World Title. Now, 17 years later, Rindo Kenzaki, the son Jun Kenzaki and nephew of Ryuuji Takane, lives with Ishimatsu Katori, the "Kenka Champion" from Ryuuji and Jun's time. Rindo will meet up with a new generation of boxers to create a new Golden Japan Jr. to take on the world.

altTitles.en: Terror

altTitles.ja: 恐怖

description.en:
Following the life of the student newspaper reporter Emiko, these are scary stories of experiences from Miyako High School :  
- Ubawareta Shinzou (Stolen Heart) – The school's mystery club sees the dangerous consequences of an innocent promise concerning heart donation after death between two friends.   
- Kyuuketsu Men (Bloodsucking Mask) – A girl who wears a demon mask from a shrine for a bad-luck-banishing drama club party ends up unable to remove it.   
- Dokuga (Poison Moth) – The science club leader creates a serum to preserve dead bodies perfectly, but it may have other unpredicted side effects.   
- Henshitsu – A couple take shelter from a storm in a strange house with a secret that might prove to be deadly.   
– These stories and many more are found in the two volumes of Kyoufu. [tethysdust]

altTitles.ja: 何も知らないけど、キミが好き。

altTitles.ja-ro: Nani mo Shiranai kedo, Kimi ga Suki

altTitles.vi: Có Thể Tôi Ngây Ngô Nhưng Tôi Thích Em

description.en: I have someone I like. Far away. It was a long way away. The reason why otaku don't fall madly in love with their favorite is because of that "distance". Airi is an otaku who rejects live-action films and is a two-dimensional supremacist. In the "2.5 dimension," the space between fiction and reality, she encounters a real-life protagonist.

A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

description.en:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

description.vi: 'Mình biết diễn biến tiếp theo của câu chuyện này.' Ngay trong khoảnh khắc ấy, thế giới cũ bị diệt vong, và một thế giới khác được mở ra. Cuộc sống của một độc giả tầm thường bỗng chuyển sang chương mới, giữa thế giới của một cuốn tiểu thuyết nọ, một cuốn tiểu thuyết mà chỉ mình anh ta biết được kết cục.
